Hey, how do I update my dstt? Can someone tell me step by step please!?
Thanks
TO EVERYONE WHO IS HAVING PROBLEMS. YOU HAVE YOU UPDATE TO THE MOST RECENT SOFTWARE AVAILABLE. THIS WILL SPEED UP THE GAME AND ALSO LET YOU SAVE THE GAME.
GO TO THE WEBSITE THAT YOU USE EG R4 OR EDGE. THEN DOWNLOAD THE MOST RECENT ONE AND DRAG IT ON TO YOUR SD CARD

tried to download on my tt card just says errcode 7 
can any one help please

To update your DSTT card just type in what your card is and Google it, go to the DSTT site and download the latest firmware, the one i downloaded was updated in December, when you have done that format your card but make sure you have backed up your game, i put my games on my desktop, then open up the file the new firmware is and drop and drag them one by one onto your sd card, their is three files to drop and drag, TTMENU, TTMENU DAT,and TTMENU SYS. when you have done that drop and drag your games over, if you cant find the firmware leave you email address and i will email the new firmware to you.
If you need firmware for a DSTT card leave your email adress and i will send it to you and tell you how to load it.
